name: aesthetic.computer
description: The header package for the whole aesthetic.computer codebase.

scripts.aesthetic: concurrently --raw "npm run code" "npm run server:session" "npm run edge" "npm run stripe" "npm run url"
scripts.edge.old: concurrently --raw "vercel dev" "http-server edge-stream -p 9000 --cors -c-1 -i --P http://localhost:3000 -S --cert ssl-dev/localhost.pem --key ssl-dev/localhost-key.pem"
scripts.assets:sync:down: aws s3 sync s3://assets-aesthetic-computer system/public/assets --endpoint-url https://sfo3.digitaloceanspaces.com
scripts.assets:sync:up: aws s3 sync system/public/assets s3://assets-aesthetic-computer --endpoint-url https://sfo3.digitaloceanspaces.com --exclude '*.DS_Store' --acl public-read
scripts.session:reset: f() { cd session-server; npx jamsocket backend terminate $1 };f
scripts.session:alive: cd session-server; npx jamsocket backend list
scripts.session:publish: cd session-server; npm run build; npm run deploy
scripts.server:session:logs: f() { cd session-server; npm run watch-prod $1; };f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
